hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said:The prophet (ﷺ) used to say when prostrating himself: “O Allah. Forgive me all my sins, small and great, first and last. “ the narrator Ibn al-sarh added: “open and secret.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الدُّعَاءِ فِي الرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: The Supplication During The Ruku' And Prostration
